name: Beautiful Magnolia Scented Candle - Floral Bliss
description: Immerse your space in the enchanting fragrance of magnolia with this Beautiful Magnolia scented candle. Perfect for creating a calm, floral atmosphere in any room.

name: Catherine Malandrino Mystere Eau de Parfum 100ml
description: Unveil the elegance of Catherine Malandrino Mystere, a captivating eau de parfum blending floral and woody notes. Perfect for adding a touch of mystery and sophistication.

name: Catherine Malandrino Violet Gem Eau de Parfum 90ml
description: Discover the luxurious essence of Catherine Malandrino Violet Gem. A delicate blend of violet, musk, and citrus, this fragrance exudes elegance and timeless beauty.

name: Catherine Malandrino's Special Moments Eau de Parfum
description: Celebrate life's unforgettable occasions with Catherine Malandrino's Special Moments. A sophisticated fragrance combining floral and fruity notes for a lasting impression.

name: Jimmy Choo Blossom Eau de Parfum
description: Indulge in the vibrant and playful scent of Jimmy Choo Blossom. A refreshing blend of sweet berries, citrus, and floral notes, perfect for a joyful, elegant fragrance experience.

name: Mad About You Fragrance Mist
description: Fall in love with the irresistible scent of Mad About You. A romantic blend of black currant, peony, and vanilla, this fragrance mist leaves you feeling refreshed and enchanted.

name: Soulful Nanette Lepore Eau de Parfum
description: Embrace the essence of elegance with Soulful Nanette Lepore. A captivating fragrance that blends floral, woody, and fruity notes, offering a sophisticated and empowering scent.

name: Transcendent Catherine Malandrino Eau de Parfum
description: Experience the allure of Transcendent Catherine Malandrino. A harmonious blend of florals, warm spices, and creamy notes, this fragrance embodies elegance and timeless sophistication.

name: You're the One Fragrance Mist
description: Delight in the irresistible charm of You're the One. A romantic blend of rose, vanilla, and white birch, this fragrance mist creates a captivating, warm, and enchanting scent.

name: Zara Man Silver Eau de Toilette
description: Zara Man Silver is a bold and fresh fragrance with notes of citrus, lavender, and wood. Ideal for the modern man, it exudes sophistication and confidence throughout the day.
